"I meant," said Ipslore, bitterly, "what is there in this world that makes living worthwhile?"

Death thought about it.

CATS, he said eventually, CATS ARE NICE.

title: Choices Will Matter In Cyberpunk 2077
body:
How much do choices affect Cyberpunk 2077? Will the protagonist change the story?

Despite it being known about for years, the worlds’ first glimpse at Cyberpunk 2077 came at E3 2018. And though a trailer was shown, the world still had a lot of questions, and CD Projekt Red has been doing its best to give the answers people seek. For example, in an interview GameMaster, one of the team noted the importance of choices:

Every well-established protagonist needs a story, and our character is no exception. That said, the choices players make will play a huge part in shaping V on more levels than they ever have in our previous games.

Whereas Geralt was a professional, a veteran monster slayer who knew the world inside out, V is a hired gun looking to make the big leagues. When you look at it this way, V’s perspective isn’t too different from the player’s, who is also just getting to know Night City and deciding their stance towards it.

Choices Will Matter In Cyberpunk 2077 was originally published on MMORPG Forums

summary: Hello, I need to follow more people for some reason, my mind and attention span say so, so if you reblog or create content for...
body:
Hello, I need to follow more people for some reason, my mind and attention span say so, so if you reblog or create content for any of the following, please LIKE/REBLOG this post so I can follow you!

  • Warframe
  • Uncharted
  • Dragon Age
  • The Witcher
  • Cyberpunk 2077
  • The Walking Dead Game
  • Assassin’s Creed
  • Mass Effect
  • Vampire: The Masquerade (or World of Darkness shit)
  • Saints Row
  • Stardew Valley
  • ARK: Survival Evolved
  • Most games in general tbh

Bonus points if you’re autistic and/or ADHD, and like to reblog memes as well

Don’t interact if you’re homophobic, racist, ableist, a T(W)ERF, and shit like that 👍

title: Cybperpunk 20177 contará con clima dinámico
body:
Cybperpunk 20177 contará con clima dinámico

Tras arrasar en el E3 con una presentación a puerta cerrada que ha dejado a todos los presentes impresionados, Cyberpunk 2077 se presenta como uno de los juegos más esperados. Poco a poco se van conociendo más detalles de la próxima obra de CD Projekt RED.

http://nosologamer.com/cd-projekt-red-detalla-el-contexto-politico-de-cyberpunk-2077/

El estudio polaco ha desvelado que incluirán cambios…

View On WordPress
